movies.title: Gekijouban Fate/stay night: Unlimited Blade Works
movies.plot: The war for the Holy Grail is on. Master/Servant team pairs made up of Magi and the summoned spirits of legendary warriors do battle to the death in their quest for the right to claim the prize. The winning team claims the Grail and it's power to grant each of them a wish.
movies.simplePlot: The war for the Holy Grail is on. Master/Servant team pairs made up of Magi and the summoned spirits of legendary warriors do battle to the death in their quest for the right to claim the ...

biography.bio: Noriaki Sugiyama was born on March 9, 1976 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Naruto: Shippûden (2007), Naruto (2002) and Fate/stay night (2006).
biography.name: Noriaki Sugiyama

biography.bio: Jun'ichi Suwabe was born on March 29, 1972 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Space Dandy (2014), Kuroko's Basketball (2012) and Appleseed Alpha (2014).
biography.name: Jun'ichi Suwabe

biography.bio: Kana Ueda was born on June 9, 1980 in Ikoma, Japan. She is an actress, known for Maria Watches Over Us (2004), Rental Magica (2007) and Saki (2009).
biography.name: Kana Ueda

biography.bio: Ayako Kawasumi was born on March 30, 1976 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Sky Girls (2007), Samurai Champloo (2004) and Fate/Zero (2011).
biography.name: Ayako Kawasumi

biography.bio: Hiroshi Kamiya was born on January 28, 1975 in Chiba, Japan. He is an actor, known for Polar Bear's Café (2012), Noragami (2014) and Trigun (1998).
biography.name: Hiroshi Kamiya

biography.bio: Joji Nakata was born in Tokyo, Japan on April 22, 1954, he is a well-known Japanese voice artist. He attended Gakuen College of Drama in Music, where he starred in various projects. Later, he started voice acting, after Michiko Nomura personally recommended him, and since the beginning of the 90s, he is doing very extensive voice work. Mr. Nakata is affiliated with Osawa Office, and is most well known as the voices of Giroro (Sgt. Frog), Amshel Goldsmith (Blood+), the Count of Monte Cristo, Alucard (Hellsing), Kirei Kotomine (Fate/stay night) and Diethard Reid in Code Geass and its sequel Code Geass Lelouch of Rebellion R2. To mention that Nakata is usually typecast as villain, because of his strong and deep voice. He is known as (Corporal Giroro in Sgt. Frog) or the narrator (Gokujou Seitokai). He has also voiced three major villain characters for Type-Moon works (Nrvnsqr Chaos in Melty Blood, Kirei Kotomine in Fate/stay night, Souren Araya in Kara no Kyoukai)and also as Lord Folken in Escaflowne (2000), the movie. He is very active on television, in theater animation and dubbing for foreign films.
biography.name: Jôji Nakata

biography.bio: Tomokazu Seki was born on September 8, 1972 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for The Mightiest Disciple Kenichi (2006), Cardcaptor Sakura (1998) and Pokémon: The Movie 2000 (1999).
biography.name: Tomokazu Seki

biography.bio: Nobutoshi Canna was born on June 10, 1968 in Tokyo, Japan as Nobutoshi Hayashi. He is an actor, known for Naruto: Shippûden (2007), Berserk (1997) and Record of Lodoss War: Chronicles of the Heroic Knight (1998).
biography.name: Nobutoshi Canna

biography.bio: Atsuko Tanaka was born on November 14, 1962 in Gunma, Japan. She is an actress, known for Ghost in the Shell (1995), Ghost in the Shell 2: Innocence (2004) and Ghost in the Shell 2.0 (2008).
biography.name: Atsuko Tanaka

biography.bio: Shin'ichirô Miki was born on March 18, 1968 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Pokémon (1997), Pokémon (1997) and Pokémon the Series: Ruby and Sapphire (2002).
biography.name: Shin'ichirô Miki

biography.bio: Noriko Shitaya was born on April 22, 1982 in Chiba, Japan. She is an actress, known for Destiny of the Shrine Maiden (2004), Eiga de tôjô! Tamagotchi dokidoki! Uchû no maigotchi?! (2007) and Bleach: Memories of Nobody (2006).
biography.name: Noriko Shitaya

biography.bio: Miki Itô was born on October 21, 1962 in Tokyo, Japan as Miki Hirano. She is known for her work on Le samouraï du crépuscule (2002), Gunnm (1993) and Maria Watches Over Us (2004).
biography.name: Miki Itô

biography.bio: Mai Kadowaki was born on September 8, 1980 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Fate/kaleid liner Prisma Illya 3rei (2016), Atelier Rorona: The Alchemist of Arland (2009) and Futakoi Alternative (2005).
biography.name: Mai Kadowaki

biography.bio: Tadahisa Saizen was born on September 25, 1964 in Osaka, Japan. He is an actor, known for Inuyasha (2000), Appleseed (2004) and Appleseed Ex Machina (2007).
biography.name: Tadahisa Saizen

biography.bio: Yu Asakawa was born on March 20, 1975 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Bubblegum Crisis: Tokyo 2040 (1998), Boogiepop Never Laughs: Boogiepop Phantom (2000) and Hikaru no go (2001). She was previously married to Shotaro Morikubo.
biography.name: Yu Asakawa
